author: Victor Bergeron A.K.A Trader Vic
description: This Tiki classic looks a little like frozen stagnant pond water but tastes minty fresh and rather good.
name: Aku Aku
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND all ingredients with a small scoop of crushed ice and fine strain into glass (push through sieve using back of a bar spoon)
